for i in range(int(input())):
    a = int(input())
    s = input()
    l = []
    j = 1
    i = 0
    k = 0
    while i < a - 1:
        if s[i] == s[j]:
            k += 1
        i += 1
        j += 1
    print(a - k)

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    i = 1
    while i < len(s):
        if s[i - 1] == s[i]:
            n = n - 1
        i = i + 1
    print(n)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    y = ''
    for i in range(len(s) - 1):
        if s[i] != s[i + 1]:
            y += s[i]
            y += '#'
        else:
            y += s[i]
    y += s[len(s) - 1]
    x = y.split('#')
    print(len(x))

p = int(input())
while p:
    n = int(input())
    str = input()
    l = []
    for i in str:
        l.append(i)
    tem = l[0]
    an = []
    const = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        if l[i] != tem:
            tem = l[i]
            an.append(const + 1)
            const = 0
        else:
            const += 1
    an.append(const + 1)
    p -= 1
    print(len(an))
